name: Skin-on Savory Mashed Potatoes
author: Moonharehayashi
summary: This is a version of Mashed Potatoes that my husband actually likes. You can use any type of potatoes and change the amounts of butter, sour cream, and milk to your taste. I like it with russets myself.
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add potatoes, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes
Drain potatoes, and transfer to a bowl
Add butter, and mash with a potato masher or electric mixer until potatoes are starting to become smooth
Add milk and sour cream, and mix to your desired texture
Careful not to over mix the potatoes once they are creamy
Season with garlic, basil, salt and pepper
